name: Decolonators
description:
Decolonators - kick capitalist colonizer butts out of Vietnam in retro-arcade game glory!

This game was made in about a month - there could be a more complete version where this came from if folks want it! Or even more levels and episodes! Let us know!

Good news! You can play Decolonators from Mac, Linux, or any platform with a browser by loading it into this site: https://ericoporto.github.io/agsjs/

Silver Spook AKA Chris Miller - art, programming, writing

Luna Oi - voices main character and main consultant as a Vietnamese communist.

Ophidian The Cobra - voices John McPain

Kate Nyx -  voices Tina Thatcher

Positive Synergy - Narration

Special thanks to Akemi and Holly Argent
